title: Copy a service design
content:
To copy a service design, you must select a specific service design version to copy. For more information about versions, see Design versions. 

  1. Select the design version you want to copy.
  2. Click the gear icon and select Save As.
  3. In the Save As dialog, enter a new display name and version.
  4. Click Save. The new service design appears.

All parts of service design (such as the service component hierarchy, properties, and configuration options) are copied. The copied service design appears in the All Design area. After you copy a service design, any changes you make to the original or to the copy won't affect the other.

Related topics
